summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Dashboard Financial tab and Reports Tracking features. All requested features verified working: Dashboard Financial shows actual data (Total Paid ₹27,62,486, Balance Due -$27,25,146, Supplier Balances with 2 suppliers). Reports Tracking tab shows 5 containers with Container #, ETD, ETA, Packages columns. View Contents dialog shows items with SKU, Description, Size, Adhesive, Liner, Qty, Price. Edit Tracking dialog has Status dropdown, Container Number, Vessel Name, BL Number, ETD, ETA, Total Packages fields.

issues: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement needed

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard Financial tab correctly displays payment summary, supplier balances, and FX exposure
Reports Tracking tab properly shows container tracking with all required columns
View Contents dialog shows complete item details including SKU, Description, Size, Adhesive, Liner, Qty, Price
Edit Tracking dialog has all required fields: Status, Container Number, Vessel Name, BL Number, ETD, ETA, Total Packages
Container-wise tab shows summary cards (Pending, Shipped, In Transit, Delivered) with container type breakdown
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working. Dashboard Financial tab shows actual payment data. Reports page has Tracking tab with container tracking table, View Contents dialog, and Edit Tracking dialog. Container-wise tab shows summary cards by status.

dashboard_financial_tab.details: Total Paid: ₹27,62,486 (11 payments), Balance Due: -$27,25,146, FX Exposure: 1 Currency, Supplier Balances: 2 suppliers with data

reports_tracking_tab.details: Container tracking table with 5 rows, columns: Container #, PO Number, Supplier, Type, Status, Packages, ETD, ETA, Value, Actions

view_container_contents.details: Dialog shows Container Type, Total Packages, Total Quantity, Utilization, Weight, CBM, Value. Items table with SKU, Description, Size, Adhesive, Liner, Qty, Unit Price, Total

edit_tracking_dialog.details: Dialog has Status dropdown, Container Number, Vessel Name, BL Number, ETD (date picker), ETA (date picker), Total Packages, Save Changes button

container_wise_tab.details: Summary cards: Pending (5, $37,340), Shipped (0), In Transit (0), Delivered (0). Container type breakdown: 20FT (4 pending), 40HC (1 pending)
